info.description: API for accessing MGO1 game and user data
info.title: Metal Gear Online 1 API

post.description:
Can be used to create a new ban or update an existing one.
If `ban_id` is set to 0, a new ban will be created.
Change the password for the currently logged in administrative user

get.description: Find users by portions of their display name or username. The Display Name in this result will be in the form of `Username (Display Name)`.
get.summary: Search User by Display Name and Username

post.description: Update the privielges granted by a particular role

get.description: Find users by portions of their display name or username. The Display Name in this result will be in the form of `Username (Display Name)`.
get.summary: Search User by Display Name and Username

get.description: Lists all users who have connected using the given IP. The IP parameter can be a prefix to search for.
get.summary: Search for Users by IP history

get.description: Lists all public/private IPs the user has connected to the MGO1 server using

post.description: Update game user's emblem status and text
Update game user profile data, such as display name and password
Change an Administrative User's username, password or role ID. If the UserID is 0, a new user will be created.
Get the profile and role of the current administrative user

get.description: Retrieves all active games and current player list. The `user` field of the GamePlayer object will be null.
Retrieves all game settings and complete player list along with their stats overview and timestamps.
Retrieves all game lobbies and player counts

post.description: Login to a specific GameUser account using the in-game credentials
Logout of any currently existing session
post.summary: Logout of a GameUser or Admin session

get.description: Retrieves all active news lists, one may have the title "policy" which is the terms of service
Retrieves the terms of service page shown ingame

Retrieves top players for a particular time-period and game-mode
- Period: all-time, weekly, archive
- Mode: Should be a game-mode (like cap, tdm, dm, etc.) or "all"

post.description: Updates the profile of the currently logged in user. You can either provide just the new display name or just old and new password.

get.description: Find users by portions of their display name

post.description: Updates the in-game settings of the currently logged in user. ALl settings must be provided.

get.description: Provides the public profile of a game user (display name, last seen, rankings, etc.)
Retrieves a high-level summary of the games a user has played in. Summary includes points, kills, deaths along with time-stamps.
get.summary: Retrieve summary of games a user has played in

get.description: Retrieves a the in-game settings for a particular user

Retrieves all stats generated by a particular user. Stats are split-up by game mode, map, and period. So a user may not have stats generated for certain combinations yet. But if there is a All-Time stat entry, there will be a matching weekly one, even if it's empty.
Provides the public profile of a the currently logged in user. Also indicates their admin id if any
get.summary: Profile of the currently logged in game user

kerotans_for_win.description: KerotansForWin is the number of Gakos rescued when Mode is rescue

kerotans_placed.description: KerotansPlaced is the number of goals as snake when Mode is sneaking

rank.description: Rank will be the rank in the mode for the period. Though stats are broken down by map also, the rank value will only consider mode.

x-enum-comments.ModeOverall: Only used by the Rankings request
